content: I’ve worked with this before and ended up manually finding the storage slot for each contract I was working with. A good way I’ve found is to use Debaub or MetaDock on Etherscan which gives visibility into storage slots. There is likely a way to heuristically determine the slot but that requires further work that I didn’t do.
